sentences.sentence: Radioactive cesium has also been detected in food.
sentences.translation: 食物中也发现了放射性铯。

sentences.sentence: Radioactive cesium has also been detected in some foods.
sentences.translation: 一些食品中还发现含有放射性铯。

sentences.sentence: Cesium versus gold is the same delta electronegativity difference.
sentences.translation: 铯和金，具有相同的电负性差。
